content: below to find me on my website instagram twitch facebook and more follow the yarn … to connect with me don t forget to tag me or use #inkyfoxtheyarnbandit so i can see your creations thank you for purchasing a copy of resources and links this pattern this pattern is intended for personal use all photos and text are subject to magic_ring video front post single_crochet video copyright © 2019 emma scanga single_crochet video please do not redistribute in any increase single_crochet video form including text and photos and slip_stitch video decrease invisible video other translations without express chain bump video permission all rights reserved bind off & sew closed video those that have purchased this half_double_crochet attaching limbs pattern may sell finished items double_crochet video however a link to my store plus using stitch markers credit must be given happy click to see a video hooking 19
